ðŸ“– Summary: KDiskMark is a user-friendly, open-source disk benchmarking tool for Linux. It provides a graphical interface to run benchmarks on HDDs and SSDs, leveraging Flexible I/O Tester (fio) for the actual testing. The tool allows users to configure test parameters and generates comprehensive, easy-to-interpret reports.
